ApexPage.description:
The page provides the functionality to contact/followup a customer which is one of the major functionality of the application.
Page allow user (mainly Collectors) to contact the customer on some transactions by email/phone/fax. User can also send an email that can contain pdf/excel data stating the detail about those transactions. User can also followup this task (Contact To Customer task) by mentioning some follow-up days on the page.
ApexPage.label: ContactCustomerPage
